captain.name: JJ Bumrah
captain.reason: Bumrah's consistent wicket-taking ability and economy rate make him a high-impact captaincy choice.

fantasy_team.name: JJ Bumrah
fantasy_team.reason: Bumrah is a strike bowler with a good economy and strike rate, crucial for taking wickets.

fantasy_team.name: Mustafizur Rahman
fantasy_team.reason: Rahman's ability to take multiple wickets (3 five-wicket hauls) makes him a high-value pick at a low credit cost.

fantasy_team.name: SN Thakur
fantasy_team.reason: Thakur is a good bowler with a knack for picking up wickets, contributing to both bowling and batting points.

fantasy_team.name: M Theekshana
fantasy_team.reason: Theekshana's economical bowling and wicket-taking ability provide consistent points.

fantasy_team.name: M Pathirana
fantasy_team.reason: Pathirana is a wicket-taker with an excellent bowling strike rate.

fantasy_team.name: S Dube
fantasy_team.reason: Dube contributes with both bat and ball, providing a good balance of points.

fantasy_team.name: RA Jadeja
fantasy_team.reason: Jadeja is a valuable all-rounder with consistent performance in both batting and bowling.

fantasy_team.name: R Shepherd
fantasy_team.reason: Shepherd is a bowling all-rounder who can contribute with wickets and some lower-order hitting.

fantasy_team.name: Ishan Kishan
fantasy_team.reason: Kishan is a aggressive opening batsman, good for scoring runs and also contributes with keeping.

fantasy_team.name: MS Dhoni
fantasy_team.reason: Dhoni's experience and potential for quick runs in the death overs and good keeping abilities makes him a valuable asset.

fantasy_team.name: DP Conway
fantasy_team.reason: Conway is a reliable top-order batter with a good average, essential for consistent scoring.

vice_captain.name: RA Jadeja
vice_captain.reason: Jadeja's all-round skills offer balanced contribution and consistent points as vice-captain.
